tool_description: Integrate a ledger layer enabling asset accounting or closed-loop payments between your users or IoT devices.
name: walletapi.cloud
title: walletapi.cloud

api_list.name: List transactions
api_list.description: Retrieve a pageable list of transactions for a time period.

api_list.name: List projects
api_list.description: Obtain a list of your projects.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://walletapi-cloud.p.rapidapi.com/projects"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "walletapi-cloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://walletapi-cloud.p.rapidapi.com/projects"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "walletapi-cloud.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

Get asset details
api_list.description: Obtain the details of an asset with provided ID.

api_list.description: Retrieve a list of your customers with pagination. Specify current page and page size as query parameters.

api_list.description: Obtain a list of system wallets for this project.

api_list.name: List operations in wallet's ledger
api_list.description: Obtain a pageable list of operations that were posted to a wallet within a specified time period.
